file_content.text: Thank you for protecting the recruits. They'll make fine militiamen thanks to you.
I heard of Vastil's wounds. I never should have sent him in to battle.
I've heard of your success against the Geonosians. You should meet up with Vastil.
Vastil and the recruits will meet you at Manister base. Help them drive off our foes.
Thanks for your help. I'll take over their training from here.
...an emergency. I repeat, this is Cole Darba at Manister base and this is an emergency!
Manister base is under attack. Send reinforcements, now!
I'll go, sir! I can take our remaining recruits.
You've been on one training mission! Don't be foolish.
I hate asking again, but I've got no choice and less time. Could you lead Vastil and his forces into battle?
We should head out immediately.
Of course. I'll do it now.
Vastil can stay here. I'll take care of this myself.
I don't need their help.
You can't shrug us off. We deserve a chance to fight.
They need this experience. They'll be defending Anchorhead long after you've left us.
Let your recruits clean up your mess.
Then I'm out. [Refuse quest]
This is your fight, not mine.
I can't abandon the speeder pad. Please... the militia's suffered so many defeats already.
I'll help, but we must move now.
Okay. We should hurry.
If I must. What's involved?
Excellent. Vastil, take the reserve recruits and scout ahead.
Yes, sir. We'll depart immediately.
Vastil will serve you well, but he's green. Don't forget that.
Please go to Manister base. The recruits will need all your help repelling the attackers, whoever they are.
You'll suffer many defeats if you don't learn to fight for yourself.
Grow a spine. [Refuse quest]
Leave us to our fight, then. We'll find some way to manage.
Wish I could've joined the fight. Just catching a bit through the viewer got my blood pumping.
They're exceptional teachers, sir. I'm ready for anything.
I've learned much, sir. She taught me well.
He was a magnificent teacher, sir. I've learned much.
I see all the recruits returned safely. Never thought I'd see the day.
I enjoyed leading them. Quite the impressive fighters.
It was my pleasure.
Not so loud. I don't want them getting all smug on me.
I could've killed more, but your recruits slowed me down.
They were a burden.
Sorry to hear that. I won't make any excuses for them.
Just be thankful you're alive, Vastil.
You sure did a good job getting my men killed! How'd you manage to lose everyone?
I did what I could. We were outnumbered.
I tried to save them.
Guess I can't blame you for everything. Tatooine's claimed more seasoned fighters than this bunch.
Your men weren't up to the challenge.
They fought poorly.
They must've been weaker than I thought. What a waste.
If your militia doesn't need anything else, I'm leaving.
Are we done here?
At least some of you survived to learn from this mess.
You lost good men out there. Thought you'd do better than that.
Hurry up. The recruits won't survive long without you.
Vastil knows where the Sand People lurk. Go with him, show his crew how to fight.
The desert's quiet for the moment. Too bad it won't last.
I'm Junter Galt, leader of the Anchorhead militia in this area. Seeing veteran warriors out here is a welcome sight.
I'm Junter Galt, leader of the Anchorhead militia in this area. We could use some of that Jedi wisdom of yours.
I'm Junter Galt, head of the Anchorhead militia in this district. You have no idea how happy I am to see a trained soldier.
I'm Junter Galt, leader of the Anchorhead militia in these parts. Looks like you've seen plenty of action, spacer. We could use that experience.
The name's Junter Galt. I'm one of the last strong leaders of the Anchorhead militia. Glad to see someone with experience in these parts.
I've lost too many good militiamen to the Sand People. All I've got left are soft recruits and no one to teach them combat skills.
Restraint, caution, defense. I'll teach them well.
I can show them the way.
That's generous of you, Master Jedi. Thank you.
I'll instruct them on fundamentals, see that they're prepared for battle.
I can teach them.
Thank you, Master Jedi. The recruits will benefit from your wisdom.
I'm highly trained. They'll have a lot to learn from me.
I can set a strong example.
Thank you. The recruits will be excited to hear the news.
I charge hourly for lessons. Handsome men get a discount.
I'll lend a hand, for a price.
My rates are fair. Ladies get a private session, free of charge.
I'll lend a hand, for a price.
You'll be compensated, of course, but I... I don't know what to say.
You're after my help?
That's right. The militia will compensate you, if that's your concern.
You can't train them?
I stand watch, make sure the Sand People don't surprise us. Our senior combat instructors were all in the last raid.
Excuse me, sir. Thought you might like a break from watch duty.
I'm not tired yet. There's someone here you should meet.
This here's Vastil. Good soldier, but no tactical know-how. He's heading up our new squad of recruits.
Think you could take these men under your wing, march them into Sand People territory, show 'em how a true warrior fights?
Bring the recruits out and we'll start immediately.
I'd be happy to.
Thank you. I promise we won't slow you down.
Prove it in the sand.
Let's go. I'm not responsible for those who don't make it.
Okay, but I'm not babysitting.
We know the risks of battle. We won't disappoint you.
I'm too busy. [Refuse quest]
Then we're done here. Back to work, Vastil.
Can't talk now. I'm keeping watch over the desert.
